comment:
* Stores a copy of the set of device state maintained by {@link DevicePolicyManager} which
 * is not directly related to admin policies. This lives in its own class so that the state
 * can be accessed from any place without risking dead locks.
 *
 * @hide

methods.name: public abstract boolean isUserOrganizationManaged(@UserIdInt int userHandle)
methods.comment: * True if either the entire device or the user is organization managed.

methodNames: public abstract boolean isUserOrganizationManaged(@UserIdInt int userHandle)
